summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from March 10, 2021, forwarding a request from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force (C-20) for FBI agents to assist with a logistical task related to the Ghislaine Maxwell case. The task involves two agents bringing digital images to 500 Pearl Street for Maxwell and her defense team to review, scheduled for March 18, 2021.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the case for which logistical assistance is being requested; her defense team is to review digital images.

persons.name: Detective
persons.context: The sender of the original request for assistance from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force (C-20).

connections.description: The detective is part of the task force investigating Maxwell, as evidenced by the request for logistical support related to her case.

events.title: Scheduled Defense Review of Digital Images
events.description: Planned for two FBI agents to bring digital images to 500 Pearl Street for Ghislaine Maxwell and her defense team to review; described as an all-day affair.

keyFacts: The NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force (C-20) requested FBI agent assistance for a logistical task related to the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
The task involved two agents bringing a hard drive containing digital images to 500 Pearl Street for Maxwell's defense review on March 18, 2021.
The email indicates ongoing case preparation and evidence review in the Maxwell prosecution as of March 2021.
The communication shows coordination between the NYPD/FBI joint task force and the broader FBI regarding case logistics.
